milestones.title: Worked with Arduino for the First Time

milestones.title: Joined Indie Hackers Community

milestones.title: Created a Showwcase Community - Notion Nerds
milestones.description: Place where we can learn to use the Notion more effectively from each other. All Notion Related stuff in one place.

milestones.title: Officially became a Maintainer at EddieHub
milestones.description: Became a maintainer for LinkFree at EddieHub. Started being more active to discord community helping more people to get started with open-source.

milestones.title: Won a Writeathon
milestones.description: Won a writeathon organized be Hashnode in the month of May 2022. Made it to top 13 among 100s of awesome writers around the Globe.

milestones.title: Received an offer for content creation at Aviyels & Tealfeed
milestones.description: Being an Active Creator at Hashnode, got me an opportunity to work as a Content Creator for Aviyels & Tealfeed.

milestones.title: Learn JavaScript from Udemy & FreeCodeCamp
milestones.description: Completed JavaScript Udemy course by Jonas Schmedtmann, and build 6 major Projects on the way.

milestones.title: Started Freelancing
milestones.description: Step into freelancing as a Content Creator for an India based organization.

milestones.title: First ever Contribution to Open-Source.
milestones.description: Made my very First contribution to Open-Source. Started with EddieHub's 'Awesome GitHub profiles' sharing my modified GitHub Profile after completing free course from Eddie Jaoude.

milestones.title: First Blog on Hashnode
